readable.title: 2434074318_e35a567220
readable.content: A male hiker wearing a brown hat is standing next to a triangular monument on the top of a mountain . A man stands at the peak of a mountain and has his hand on a monument . A man stands near a statue on a mountaintop . A man stands on a peak near a statue . A man with a hat stands next to a pyramid-shaped monument on a cliff .
